properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT.CATE2_NO , PRODUCT_BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_DATE , PRODUCT_FILE_RENAME FROM PRODUCT, PRODUCT_CATEGORY2, PRODUCT_FILE WHERE PRODUCT.CATE2_NO = PRODUCT_CATEGORY2.CATE2_NO AND PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO = PRODUCT_FILE.PRODUCT_NO AND CATE1_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_FILE_ORIGIN_NAME LIKE '%main%' ORDER BY PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO ASC
SELECT C1.CATE1_NO , C2.CATE2_NO , C2.CATE2_NAME FROM PRODUCT_CATEGORY1 C1, PRODUCT_CATEGORY2 C2 WHERE C1.CATE1_NO = C2.CATE1_NO AND C2.CATE1_NO = ?

SELECT PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT.CATE2_NO , PRODUCT_BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_DATE , PRODUCT_FILE_RENAME FROM PRODUCT, PRODUCT_CATEGORY2, PRODUCT_FILE WHERE PRODUCT.CATE2_NO = PRODUCT_CATEGORY2.CATE2_NO AND PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO = PRODUCT_FILE.PRODUCT_NO AND CATE1_NO = ? AND CATE2_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_FILE_ORIGIN_NAME LIKE '%main%' ORDER BY PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO ASC
SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_DETAIL , PRODUCT_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_FILE_NO , PRODUCT_FILE_RENAME FROM PRODUCT_FILE WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
SELECT OPTION_NO , PRODUCT_NO , OPTION_NAME , OPTION_PRICE , OPTION_STOCK FROM PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?

SELECT PRODUCT_CATEGORY1.CATE1_NO , CATE2_NO , CATE1_NAME , CATE2_NAME FROM PRODUCT_CATEGORY1, PRODUCT_CATEGORY2 WHERE PRODUCT_CATEGORY1.CATE1_NO = PRODUCT_CATEGORY2.CATE1_NO AND PRODUCT_CATEGORY1.CATE1_NO = 1
